title: Mini-Ep 236: It's Meatless Monday
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 236: It's Meatless Monday
itunes:subtitle: Kate institutes Meatless Mondays in her house and Doree gives herself a half-decent pedicure. Then, they hear from listeners about following your jealousy, grieving the loss of your childhood home, and get a wedding update. - To leave a voicemail or...
description:
Kate institutes Meatless Mondays in her house and Doree gives herself a half-decent pedicure. Then, they hear from listeners about following your jealousy, grieving the loss of your childhood home, and get a wedding update.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
